name: The Appetite of Blaise the Fire
name_original: The Appetite of Blaise the Fire
description:
Your very own fire, Blaise, is hungry. Can you leave such a flam(e)boyant friend die from hunger? Hell no! Let's feed him with everything in sight, and let it grow!

Control:
Click on Object to catch them, and release the mouse button to release the object as well!

A UE4 game by SirKovitch(Boris Kolimaga), Anton Salikhov(VisonMignon) and Vincent Jalliffier-Merlon(Drunkain).
